# About

------------------------------------------------------------------------

Brayden Boyko is a fourth-year finance major at the University of Alberta with an elite-level hockey refereeing background, spanning nine years. His keen interest in quantitative finance has led to the development of a versatile skill set:

-   **SQL Expertise:** At Grainger Canada's Finance team in Toronto, Brayden built complex tools to track freight and foreign exchange impacts on 2.5 million products. View: [SnowFlake Python Integration With Okta Sign-On.](https://github.com/boykowealth/snowflake_okta)

-   **Python Expertise:** Brayden has created automated investment research reports for approximately 65,000 investment products, accessible via an online dashboard. View: [Boyko Wealth](https://www.boykowealth.com/).

-   **R Skills:** Recently, Brayden collaborated with a coworker to construct a predictive model for wheat spreads, employing machine learning and web scraping techniques. View: [Forecasting Spreads In The Canadian Western Spring Wheat Market](https://boykowealth.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/forecasting_cwrs13_5.html).
